publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-378 Rosie Kane#: Mandatory 20 mph Zonesâ€”That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Executive should make 20 mph speed zones mandatory within a 250m radius of schools and hospitals, throughout residential areas and on motorway/dual carriageway off-ramps.
S2M-378# Mandatory 20 MPH Zones (lodged on 22 September 2003) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-378# Mandatory 20 MPH Zones (lodged on 22 September 2003) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Alex Neil*, Eleanor Scott*

S2M-378# Rosie Kane: Mandatory 20 MPH Zones-That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Executive should make 20 mph speed zones mandatory within a 250m radius of schools and hospitals, throughout residential areas and on motorway/dual carriageway off-ramps. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Frances Curran, Carolyn Leckie, Alex Neil, Eleanor Scott
S2M-378# Mandatory 20 MPH Zones (lodged on 22 September 2003) John Swinburne*
